pages.about: About Vintage Vogue India - Our Story and Mission VintageVogue Home About Us Reviews Contact Explore Home About Us Reviews FAQs Contact Passionate About Vintage Fashion? At VintageVogue, we're not just selling clothes; we're preserving a legacy. If you're passionate about vintage fashion, this is where you belong. How It Works Discover Your Vintage Style Let us guide you through our curated collections to find pieces that resonate with your unique style and taste. 1 Find Your Favorite Era Explore our collections and discover the charm of different fashion eras, from the roaring '20s to the swinging '60s. 1 1 2 Share Your Style Connect with us and share your love for vintage fashion. We value personal style and are here to celebrate yours. 2 2 3 Join Our Community Become part of our community of vintage fashion lovers. Receive updates on new arrivals, exclusive offers, and fashion tips. 3 3 4 Start Your Vintage Journey Welcome to VintageVogue, where every piece tells a story and every purchase is a step into the past with style. 4 4 Get Started Passionate About Vintage Fashion? Join VintageVogue and discover the beauty of vintage fashion. Our curated collections celebrate the craftsmanship and elegance of past eras. What Makes Vintage Fashion Unique? Vintage fashion embodies the elegance and style of past eras, offering timeless pieces that celebrate craftsmanship and creativity. How Can I Find the Perfect Vintage Piece? Explore VintageVogue's curated collections and find pieces that resonate with your personal style and taste. Each garment tells a story of its own, making it a unique addition to your wardrobe. Why Choose VintageVogue? VintageVogue is dedicated to preserving fashion history through curated collections that celebrate the craftsmanship and style of past eras. Join us in celebrating the beauty of vintage fashion. What Types of Vintage Clothing Do You Offer? Our curated collections include a wide range of vintage clothing, from elegant dresses to classic accessories. Each piece is selected for its quality and timeless appeal. How Can I Style Vintage Clothing? VintageVogue offers style tips and inspiration to help you incorporate vintage pieces into your wardrobe. Explore our curated collections and discover the art of vintage fashion. VintageVogue Home About Us Reviews FAQs Contact © 2024, VintageVogue Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions

From Happy Customers to Vintage Enthusiasts Explore stories from our community and see why VintageVogue is more than just a store—it's a destination for vintage fashion lovers. James Smith VintageVogue helped me find my personal style through their unique collection of vintage clothing. Each piece has its own story to tell. Emily White As a vintage fashion enthusiast, finding VintageVogue was a dream come true. Their curated collections allow me to express my love for history through fashion. Olivia Taylor VintageVogue has transformed how I view fashion. Their dedication to quality and style is unmatched, making every purchase feel like a journey through time. Michael Johnson I've always been drawn to the elegance of vintage clothing. VintageVogue not only satisfies my passion but also introduces me to new styles and eras. Benjamin Brown VintageVogue understands that fashion is more than just clothes—it's a form of art. They celebrate craftsmanship and style, making every piece a statement of individuality. Christopher Davis VintageVogue's dedication to preserving fashion history is evident in every piece they offer. Their commitment to quality ensures each garment is a testament to its era. Discover Vintage Charm Experience the magic of vintage fashion with VintageVogue. Explore our curated collections and find your own piece of fashion history. Hidden Treasures Await Unlock exclusive vintage finds that tell stories of style and craftsmanship. Our curated collections are designed to inspire and delight. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Vintage Vogue VintageVogue Home About Us Reviews Contact Explore Home About Us Reviews FAQs Contact Privacy Policy Effective Date: July 4, 2024 Welcome to Vintage Vogue. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website. 1. Information Collection We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on our site, place an order, subscribe to our newsletter, or fill out a form. Information collected may include your name, email address, mailing address, phone number, and payment details. We also collect information automatically about your visit to our website through cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience. 2. Use of Information We use the information we collect to process your orders, communicate with you, personalize your experience, improve our website, and send you promotional offers. Your information helps us to effectively respond to your customer service requests and support needs. 3. Sharing of Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties without your consent, except as described in this Privacy Policy. We may share your information with trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. 4. Security Measures We implement appropriate security measures to protect the security of your personal information both online and offline. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. 5. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, update, or delete your personal information. You may also opt-out of receiving any promotional communications from us. To exercise these rights or for any questions regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us using the information provided below. 6. Changes to This Policy We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. It is your responsibility to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information. 7. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us: Phone: +91-408-4689294 Email: vintage-vogue@gmail.com Address: 1, Babu Jagjivan Ram Rd, Shanti Kunj Main, Sector D, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi, Delhi 110070 VintageVogue Home About Us Reviews FAQs Contact © 2024, VintageVogue Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - Vintage Vogue VintageVogue Home About Us Reviews Contact Explore Home About Us Reviews FAQs Contact Terms and Conditions Effective Date: July 4, 2024 1. Acceptance of Terms By accessing or using Vintage Vogue's website, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, our Privacy Policy, and all applicable laws and regulations. You agree not to engage in any activity that disrupts or interferes with our website's functionality or security. 3. You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works of any content without our prior written consent. 4. Products and Services We make every effort to accurately display the descriptions and prices of our products. However, we do not warrant that the product descriptions or other content on our website are accurate, complete, reliable, current, or error-free. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any product or service without notice at any time. 5. Limitation of Liability In no event shall Vintage Vogue, its directors, officers, employees, or affiliates be liable for any direct, indirect, special, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or related to your use of this site or the products purchased from this site. 6. Governing Law These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. 7. Changes to These Terms We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms and Conditions at any time without prior notice. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. 8. Contact Us If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us: Phone: +91-408-4689294 Email: vintage-vogue@gmail.com Address: 1, Babu Jagjivan Ram Rd, Shanti Kunj Main, Sector D, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi, Delhi 110070 VintageVogue Home About Us Reviews FAQs Contact © 2024, VintageVogue Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
